bridge-type.label: Freebox Server
bridge-type.description: Provides connection to freebox server API

parameter.name: fqdn
parameter.label: Freebox Server FQDN
parameter.description: The IP address / FQDN of the Freebox Server (can include port number)

parameter.name: appToken
parameter.label: Application Token
parameter.description: Token generated by the Freebox server

parameter.name: refreshInterval
parameter.label: Refresh Interval
parameter.description: The refresh interval in seconds which is used to poll given Freebox Server

parameter.name: useOnlyHttp
parameter.label: Use Only HTTP API
parameter.description: Use HTTP API even if HTTPS is available
